thread.title: Kris Jenner Reveals Boyfriend Corey Gamble Prefers Her Makeup-Free Looks
thread.title_full: Kris Jenner Reveals Boyfriend Corey Gamble Prefers Her Makeup-Free Looks

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Kris Jenner Reveals Boyfriend Corey Gamble Prefers Her Makeup-Free Looks
text:
Comments The 'Keeping Up with the Kardashians' star reveals that her boyfriend Corey prefers her 'no-makeup' looks to her glamorous looks. 
Kris Jenner always puts on makeup 6 days in a week but her boyfriend Corey Gamble is surprisingly not into her glamorous looks. In a recent interview with E! News during Paris Fashion Week, the 59-year-old momager said Corey preferred her looks without makeup. When Kris was asked how Corey preferred her looks, glamorous looks or no makeup, Kris simply answered, "No makeup." The " Keeping Up with the Kardashians " star also revealed that Sunday was her makeup-free day. "Sunday is my day," she said. "Sundays I don't like to talk to anybody, and I like no makeup, my sweats and just hangout with the kids at the house. With the little ones." During the interview, Kris also revealed how excited she was when she was preparing herself for her daughter Kendall Jenner 's runway show at the same event last year. "Here I am in the Givenchy showroom, in Paris, getting dressed for a fashion show, so I can sit front row so I can watch my daughter walk in Paris Fashion Week," Kris explained. "I said, 'It doesn't get any better than this.' It was so exciting. I'm grateful." The proud mother took to Instagram on October 1 to share some snaps of Kendall walking down the runway. One of the snaps which showed Kendall in a white dress came along with the caption, "Beautiful today Kendall at The Balmain Show!!!!" The other snap showing two images of Kendall in different outfits was captioned, "LOVED @kendalljenner 's 2 looks today walking for @balmainparis."
